ayas.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
ayas.translation: Hath there come upon man (ever) any period of time in which he was a thing unremembered?
ayas.transliteration: hal atā `alal-insāni ḥīnun minad dahri lam yakun shay-an madhkūrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
ayas.translation: Lo! We create man from a drop of thickened fluid to test him; so We make him hearing, knowing.
ayas.transliteration: innā khalaqnal-insāna min nuṭfatin amshājin nabtalīhi faja`alnāhu samī`an baṣīrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
ayas.translation: Lo! We have shown him the way, whether he be grateful or disbelieving.
ayas.transliteration: innā hadaynāhus sabīla immā shākiran wa immā kafūrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
ayas.translation: Lo! We have prepared for disbelievers manacles and carcans and a raging fire.
ayas.transliteration: innā a`tadnā lilkāfirīna salāsila wa-aghlālan wasa`īrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
ayas.translation: Lo! the righteous shall drink of a cup whereof the mixture is of Kafur,
ayas.transliteration: innal-abrāra yashrabūna min ka-sin kāna mizājuhā kāfūrā

ayas.arabic: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
ayas.translation: A spring wherefrom the slaves of Allah drink, making it gush forth abundantly,
ayas.transliteration: `aynan yashrabu bihā `ibādullāhi yufajjirūnahā tafjīrā

ayas.arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
ayas.translation: (Because) they perform the vow and fear a day whereof the evil is wide-spreading,
ayas.transliteration: yūfūna bin nadhri wayakhāfūna yawman kāna sharruhu mustaṭīrā

ayas.arabic: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
ayas.translation: And feed with food the needy wretch, the orphan and the prisoner, for love of Him,
ayas.transliteration: wayuṭ`imūnaṭ ṭa`āma `alā ḥubbihi miskīnan wayatīman wa-asīrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
ayas.translation: (Saying): We feed you, for the sake of Allah only. We wish for no reward nor thanks from you;
ayas.transliteration: innamā nuṭ`imukum liwajhillāhi lā nurīdu minkum jazā-an walā shukūrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
ayas.translation: Lo! we fear from our Lord a day of frowning and of fate.
ayas.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman `abūsan qamṭarīrā

ayas.arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
ayas.translation: Therefor Allah hath warded off from them the evil of that day, and hath made them find brightness and joy;
ayas.transliteration: fawaqāhumullāhu sharra dhālikal yawmi walaqqāhum naḍratan wasurūrā

ayas.arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
ayas.translation: And hath awarded them for all that they endured, a Garden and silk attire;
ayas.transliteration: wajazāhum bimā ṣabarū jannatan waḥarīrā

ayas.arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
ayas.translation: Reclining therein upon couches, they will find there neither (heat of) a sun nor bitter cold.
ayas.transliteration: muttaki-īna fīhā `alal-arā-ik ۖ lā yarawna fīhā shamsan walā zamharīrā

ayas.arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
ayas.translation: The shade thereof is close upon them and the clustered fruits thereof bow down.
ayas.transliteration: wadāniyatan `alayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlā

ayas.arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
ayas.translation: Goblets of silver are brought round for them, and beakers (as) of glass
ayas.transliteration: wayuṭāfu `alayhim bi-āniyatim min fiḍḍatin wa-akwābin kānat qawārīrā

ayas.arabic: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
ayas.translation: (Bright as) glass but (made) of silver, which they (themselves) have measured to the measure (of their deeds).
ayas.transliteration: qawārīra min fiḍḍatin qaddarūhā taqdīrā

ayas.arabic: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
ayas.translation: There are they watered with a cup whereof the mixture is of Zanjabil,
ayas.transliteration: wayusqawna fīhā ka-san kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlā

ayas.arabic: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
ayas.translation: (The water of) a spring therein, named Salsabil.
ayas.transliteration: `aynan fīhā tusammā salsabīlā

ayas.arabic: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
ayas.translation: There wait on them immortal youths, whom, when thou seest, thou wouldst take for scattered pearls.
ayas.transliteration: wayaṭūfu `alayhim wildānun mukhalladūna idhā ra-aytahum ḥasibtahum lu-lu-an manthūrā

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
ayas.translation: When thou seest, thou wilt see there bliss and high estate.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta na`īman wa mulkan kabīrā

ayas.arabic: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
ayas.translation: Their raiment will be fine green silk and gold embroidery. Bracelets of silver will they wear. Their Lord will slake their thirst with a pure drink.
ayas.transliteration: `āliyahum thiyābu sundusin khuḍrun wa istabraq ۖ waḥullū asāwira min fiḍḍatin wasaqāhum rabbuhum sharāban ṭahūrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
ayas.translation: (And it will be said unto them): Lo! this is a reward for you. Your endeavour (upon earth) hath found acceptance.
ayas.transliteration: inna hādhā kāna lakum jazā-an wakāna sa`yukum mashkūrā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
ayas.translation: Lo! We, even We, have revealed unto thee the Qur'an, a revelation;
ayas.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā `alaykal qur-āna tanzīlā

ayas.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
ayas.translation: So submit patiently to thy Lord's command, and obey not of them any guilty one or disbeliever.
ayas.transliteration: faṣbir liḥukmi rabbika walā tuṭi` minhum āthiman aw kafūrā

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
ayas.translation: Remember the name of thy Lord at morn and evening.
ayas.transliteration: wadhkuris-ma rabbika bukratan wa-aṣīlā

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
ayas.translation: And worship Him (a portion) of the night. And glorify Him through the livelong night.
ayas.transliteration: wa minal layli fasjud lahu wasabbiḥ-hu laylan ṭawīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
ayas.translation: Lo! these love fleeting life, and put behind them (the remembrance of) a grievous day.
ayas.transliteration: inna hā-ulā-i yuḥibbūnal `ājilata wayadharūna warā-ahum yawman thaqīlā

ayas.arabic: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
ayas.translation: We, even We, created them, and strengthened their frame. And when We will, We can replace them, bringing others like them in their stead.
ayas.transliteration: naḥnu khalaqnāhum washadadnā asrahum ۖ wa idhā shi-nā baddalnā amthālahum tabdīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
ayas.translation: Lo! this is an Admonishment, that whosoever will may choose a way unto his Lord.
ayas.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkirah ۖ faman shā-at-takhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlā

ayas.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
ayas.translation: Yet ye will not, unless Allah willeth. Lo! Allah is Knower, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā tashā-ūna illā an yashā-allāh ۚ innallāha kāna `alīman ḥakīmā

ayas.arabic: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
ayas.translation: He maketh whom He will to enter His mercy, and for evil-doers hath prepared a painful doom.
ayas.transliteration: yudkhilu man yashā-u fī raḥmatih ۚ waẓ ẓālimīna a`adda lahum `adhāban alīmā
